I

iu.util.auth.config - module iu.util.auth.config
Provides internal configuration management support for authentication and authorization implementation modules.
IuAuthConfig - Interface in edu.iu.auth.config
Authentication and authorization configuration management interface.
IuPublicKeyPrincipalConfig - Interface in edu.iu.auth.config
Describes an authorization configuration that describes a public key or public/private key pair, for use with digital signature creation and validation, encryption, and decryption.
